title: Tabs not syncing between certain devices
content:
Hey all,

I have 4 devices connected to Firefox Sync.

  1. Mac deskop
  2. Mac laptop
  3. iPhone
  4. iPad

It appears that the sync will sync extensions between the deskop and laptop ok, but not tabs. Both computers can see synced tabs from the mobile devices but not from each other.

I have logged out and in, turned on sync and off and on again, changed device names just to see if that refreshed things, removed them from the logged in list to kick them out and then logged in again, changed the tick boxes for sync items and yet tabs will not sync.

When I look under History > Synced Tabs I see the two mobile devices and their tabs but I don't even see the other Mac listed, let alone its tabs.

Help appreciated.
creator: raddougall

title: Mozilla emails keep coming to the old address after changing Primary email
content:
I changed my account primary email a few month ago. No problems there, I use the new email to login.

But today I got a news email from `mozilla@email.mozilla.org` (about "[accounts renamed Mozilla accounts - What you need to know]") on my old email address.

I don't have any redirection in my email clients, I don't have secondary email. Checked here: - https://accounts.firefox.com/settings - https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/newsletter/existing/

What else can I do?

title: Save as not working
content:
I used to be able to right click an image and select save as, but now when I right click and select save as I do not get the menu to save in a location on my pc.

Also firebox will not download any files, and also when using my web site's Upload or download a file, this does not work anymore.

They used to work, but I have to use chromium browser to do things in.

Also Firefox will export any files or even my bookmarks.

Been happening for around five weeks now and is impeding my work flow enormously.

Please held.

I have tried all the fixes I can find online without success.

Regards James

Ps even here where it says add images (optional) it will not open a box to browse my files.

title: Shown letter in FF are different than typed
content: Hello, I have problems with Firefox web browser probabely since last automatic update (last week). Problem is that when I write something into search field in Google or another searchh engines, letters that will appear are different than I wrote on keyboard. For example I wrote " firefox podpora" but letter shown are "ffrefix ridrira". It happens only in FF. In same time I opened Chrome browser or Opera browser and tried to write same letters and in these browsers are all shown OK. Such letters discrepancy is not happen all the time but occasionaly during day seasons and take some minutes untill things go correct again. I use last version of FF 115.3.1esr Antivirus and antimalware programs shows computer as free of malware, viruses ... Can you pls help me to solve this problem? Thank you.

I have enabled the "Reduce motion" in macOS to limit animations when using app exposé or switching between desktops. Firefox seems to read this option from the OS and limit its animations, such as the loading animation shown next to a tab description when loading a window.

Is there an option to ignore the OS settings and enable all animations in Firefox?

title: private-window command line option doesn't support multiple URLs
content:
If I open a normal firefox window then run "firefox.exe -private-window mozilla.org google.com" it will open mozilla.org in a new private browser window and google.com in the existing standard browsing window. I have tried every combination of -private, -private-window, and -url that I can think of, but to no success.

I am happy to write a fix for this if you can confirm the defect and provide a bug number :)
creator: ponopaco

title: How to disable background connections made by Firefox to download icons for top sites page and site screenshot for recently visited sites.
content: Background connections made by Firefox to fetch icons and site screenshot without user permission is a privacy flaw. I have noticed this through about:processes.
creator: firefoxenjoyer

title: Problemas con Mozilla Firefox en el correo de hotmail
content:
Hola, soy un fiel usuario de Mozilla Firefox, apesar de que Microsoft Edge viene por defecto en Windows 10, yo tengo por defecto a Mozilla Firefox porque para mi es el mejor navegador lejos.

El problema que tengo es puntual y es en el correo de hotmail. (¿Que casualidad no??)

Hace no mucho tiempo (un par de meses) me estoy dando cuenta que cuando me entro al mi correo de hotmail la pagina se queda congelada sin poder clickear en ningun email, o carpeta, la unica opcion para solucionar esto es darle F5 y ahi agarra bien. (Esto no sucede con los demas navegadores, por eso viniendo de Microsoft me huele mal).

Yo se que es un problema menor, pero si gustan probar asi cuando puedan lo solucionan.

Muchisimas Gracias.
creator: lrmcbaarg

title: No Certificate Picker for CAC/PIV Use
content:
I am trying to use a CAC/PIV reader to authenticate and access a Microsoft OWA site. This process works fine on both Chrome and Safari but I'd prefer to use Firefox. So far, I've installed and loaded the Keychain-PKCS11 library and restarted the browser. When I start the browser--before trying to go to any page--I get this error:

"Please authenticate to the token “[TOKEN NAME REDACTED]”. How to do so depends on the token (for example, using a fingerprint reader or entering a code with a keypad)."

When I go to the log-in page and select the "login with CAC" option, Firefox returns a certificate-not-found error.
creator: AlFajores

title: Voice call on Discord always shows 0 ms ping and no one can hear me
content:
I am trying to use Discord on Firefox but voice call doesn't seem to work. My microphone is being detected by Discord and when I do a mic test on discord's settings page I can hear my microphone. But when I'm in a voice call the ping is always 0 ms (see the attached picture). When I talk I can see the green indicator around my profile below. But the person I'm talking to can not hear anything. It is the same with voice channels. Please help me with this.

Discord desktop app works fine.

My OS is Arch Linux.

title: Restore Session Opens Tabs From The Beginning of the Last Session, Not the End of the Last Session
content:
Hello,

I have Firefox set to reopen my tabs from the last session when it starts up.

However, I delete, open, and reuse/write over the address of many tabs, as anyone might, during a session.

When Firefox reopens my last session, it starts all over again as if no changes had occurred in the tabs during the last session, even though the browser has been open for hours or even days and, as I said, many tab changes have occurred.

This being frozen in time with the same startup tabs is time consuming and causes other problems, as all progress with work and things I'm researching is repeatedly lost an I must start over.

How can I get Firefox to open the tabs from the END of the last session and not the beginning?

(Note: Firefox used to open the tabs from the end of the last session with no problem, but at some point switched to opening tabs only from the beginning of the last session).
creator: zezozece
